name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ernest E. BOULWARE, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ernest E. BOULWARE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Franklin Noel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
411 A.2d 215
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Ernest E. BOULWARE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 24, 1980.
Decided Feb. 25, 1980.
Benjamin Paul, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Franklin Noel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
